name: 3rd International Conference on Clinical Oncology & Radiation Therapy
content: We are pleased and honored to invite you to the “3rd International Conference on Clinical Oncology & Radiation Therapy” which is going to be held during October 27-28, 2022 | Amsterdam, Netherlands | Hybrid. This conference is organized around the theme “ Building bridges to overcome Cancer free world” which covers a wide range of critically important sessions from basic research to latest innovations in the field of Oncology. For more details please have glands at: https://oncology.insightconferences.com/
